product_name: adidas Terrex Swift Hollow Fleece Jacket - Men's
long_description: Turn up the heat yet stay dry as you work out in the men's adidas Terrex Swift Hollow Fleece Jacket. Special hollow-core fibers that keep you warm yet let sweat evaporate make this jacket tick. Lightweight, breathable Climawarm(R) fleece with Thermolite(R) fabric traps warm air close to the skin by using densely woven, hollow-core fibers. Just enough spacing between the fibers allows perspiration to escape to the surface and evaporate so you stay dry. Spandex added for stretch frees up your arm movements. Terrex Swift Hollow Fleece Jacket features zippered hand pockets and a zippered chest pocket.
short_description: Turn up the heat yet stay dry as you work out in the men's adidas Terrex Swift Hollow Fleece Jacket. Special hollow-core fibers that keep you warm yet let sweat evaporate make this jacket tick.
